citations.narrative:
*** The knives use to prepare vegetables for the goats was found in an upright container that was dirty and filled with
markers, can openers, and scissors. The knives pulled were dirty and so was the cutting board used for food preparation.
Using dirty knives and storing them in this manner, does not keep the food free from contamination and can negatively
impact the nutritive value of the food being provided. This food preparation area and equipment needs to be addressed to
ensure the food shall be wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination when fed to the animals.
Correct by: Sept 23, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.129(a) 
   
Feeding. 
*** The knives use to prepare vegetables for the goats was found in an upright container that was dirty and filled with 
markers, can openers, and scissors. The knives pulled were dirty and so was the cutting board used for food preparation. 
Using dirty knives and storing them in this manner, does not keep the food free from contamination and can negatively 
impact the nutritive value of the food being provided. This food preparation area and equipment needs to be addressed to 
ensure the food shall be wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination when fed to the animals.  
 
Correct by: Sept 23, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
